site_name: The Victoria, 28 North Hill, Hornsey, London, N6 4QA
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Approval of details for Condition 4 (Method of construction statement) of planning permission ref. HGY/2021/2950 granted on 29/11/2021 for Demolition of an existing two storey side extension to the pub and the construction of a two storey dwelling to facilitate the creation of a two bedroom residential unit. Internal reconfiguration of the existing pub and the ancillary residential accommodation at first floor with a part single, part two storey rear extension with roof addition over to facilitate a loft conversion and the creation of 2 x self-contained flats.
